title: Rewatch Jacob Rees-Mogg and David Gauke explain if and how Tories can 'Get Brexit Done'
text:
On the second day of the Conservative Party Conference, The Telegraph's Christopher Hope interviewed Leader of the House of Commons, Jacob Rees-Mogg, and former Justice secretary David Gauke, during a live edition of Chopper’s Brexit Podcast.

Rewatch our livestream above on this page to watch him explain how the party can deliver on their conference slogan: “Get Brexit Done”, amid growing political chaos, and reflect on what will happen if they don’t.

Chopper’s Brexit Podcast is The Telegraph’s weekly Brexit show available on Apple Podcasts , Spotify and all good podcast apps.
description: On the second day of the Conservative Party Conference, The Telegraph's Christopher Hope  interviewed Leader of the House of Commons, Jacob Rees-Mogg,  and former Justice secretary David Gauke, during a live edition of Chopper’s Brexit Podcast.
